("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
Within seven (7) calendar days after appointment the arbitrator shall set the hearing date, which shall be within 90 days after the filing date of the demand for arbitration unless a later date is required for good cause shown and shall order a mutual exchange of what he/she determines to be relevant documents and the dates thereafter for the taking of up to a maximum of 5 depositions by each party to last no more than 2 days in aggregate for each party.
("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
In addition to all other relief, the arbitrator shall have the power to award reasonable attorneys' fees to the prevailing party.
("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
The arbitrator shall make his or her award no later than 7 calendar days after the close of evidence or the submission of final briefs, whichever occurs later.
("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
Any notices permitted or required by this Agreement shall be sent by telex, telecopy, registered mail or other recognized private mail carrier service and shall be effective when received if sent and addressed as follows or to such other address as may be designated by a party in writing: If to Purchaser: Hansens Beverage Company 1010 Railroad St Corona, Ca 92882 Attention: Rodney Sacks Copy to: Hilton Schlosberg If to 7UP/RC: 3220 East 26th St. Los Angeles, CA 90023 Attention: Steve Walb Copy to: Mike Nelson, Esq.
("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
No modification of any of the terms of this Agreement shall be deemed to be valid unless it is in writing and signed by the party against whom enforcement is sought.
("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
No course of dealing or usage of trade shall be used to modify the terms and conditions herein.
("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
No waiver by either party of any default shall be effective unless in writing, nor shall any such waiver operate as a waiver of any other default or of the same default on a future occasion.
("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the successors or permitted assigns of each of the parties and may not be assigned or transferred by either party without the prior written consent of the other.

("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
4329 TriBlender TriClover machine together with two 328 Waukesha transfer pumps with 10 h.p.
("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
("New Equipment") and assume financial responsibility for the installation and wiring thereof, in accordance with the estimate from BEECO which is attached hereto as Exhibit C. Purchaser shall pay for the New Equipment after confirmation from 7UP/RC that the same has been supplied and duly installed at 7UP/RC and is fully operational.
("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
Purchaser shall also be financially responsible for all taxes and freight in connection with the New Equipment.
("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
7UP/RC agrees not to use the New Equipment for the production, at its Buena Park, California facility of any other energy drinks similar to the Products, without Purchaser's prior written consent.
("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
Upon the termination of the Agreement for whatever reason, Purchaser shall be entitled to remove the New Equipment or, alternatively, to negotiate the sale of the New Equipment to 7UP/RC at the fair market value thereof at that time.
("JAMS") in accordance with JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures (the "Rules").
Should 7UP/RC and the Purchaser agree to the sale of the New Equipment to 7UP/RC upon the termination of this Agreement, 7UP/RC shall be entitled to use the New Equipment to produce other energy drinks as well as Products.

Upon the termination of the Agreement for whatever reason, Purchaser shall be entitled to remove the New Equipment or, alternatively, to negotiate the sale of the New Equipment to 7UP/RC at the fair market value thereof at that time.
No waiver by either party of any default shall be effective unless in writing, nor shall any such waiver operate as a waiver of any other default or of the same default on a future occasion.
Should 7UP/RC and the Purchaser agree to the sale of the New Equipment to 7UP/RC upon the termination of this Agreement, 7UP/RC shall be entitled to use the New Equipment to produce other energy drinks as well as Products.
No waiver by either party of any default shall be effective unless in writing, nor shall any such waiver operate as a waiver of any other default or of the same default on a future occasion.
Save as aforesaid the Agreement shall be unaffected hereby and shall continue in full force and effect between the parties.
No waiver by either party of any default shall be effective unless in writing, nor shall any such waiver operate as a waiver of any other default or of the same default on a future occasion.
